messages.message: Hi all, I'd like to share that we now have a Slack alert channel for bug tickets open in the Jira EPD project <#C066HRYCUEB|> (kudos to @Jessica for setting this up!). This channel will help engineering monitor field-reported bugs more timely -- I already added all engineering managers to the channel, I encourage you to join too (or ask your manager if they'd like you to join).
